tool_description: Personalizes automated responses using customer insights, review context, and business relationship data to create more engaging and relevant customer communications.

customer_tier.description: Customer tier: vip, premium, standard, new

purchase_history_summary.description: Brief summary of customer's purchase patterns

personalization_level.description: Level of personalization: minimal, standard, high

include_loyalty_references.description: Whether to include references to customer loyalty

error_messages: Empty base response: Provide non-empty base_response parameter for personalization.
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [vip, premium, standard, new].
Invalid personalization level: Use one of [minimal, standard, high].
Invalid interaction count: previous_interactions must be a non-negative integer.
usage: Provide base_response as the foundation text to personalize. Add customer_name, customer_tier, and purchase_history_summary for context. Set personalization_level to control the degree of customization applied to the response.

personalized_response.description: Fully personalized response text ready for delivery

personalization_elements.description: Specific elements that were personalized in the response

tone_adjustments.description: Tone adjustments made based on customer profile

relationship_references.description: Whether response includes references to customer relationship
